name: With Your Destiny

files.setup: N/A:Select the RAR file downloaded from http://wydsephira.com.br

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the RAR file downloaded from http://wydsephira.com.br
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/WYD SEPHIRA/WYDLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine 64-bit Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Installing the game
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    file: setup
system:
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
